about.title: About Me
about.data: I’m a Full Stack Developer specialized in building scalable software using .NET on the backend and Vue, React or Next.js on the frontend. I care about clean code, modular architecture, and long-term maintainability. I’m self-taught, proactive, and always seeking smarter ways to solve real problems.
